items.sentence: When was the last time you mopped the kitchen?
Where did Tom live before moving to Australia?
Tom is afraid to go out after dark, isn\'t he?
I wish I could play the guitar as well as Tom.
I wish I could play volleyball as well as Tom.
I wish I could speak French as well as you do.
I\'ll see if I can find out who Tom went with.
I\'ll show you how to separate gold from sand.
I\'ll sleep on the couch. You can have my bed.
I\'ll stay with you as long as you want me to.
